summary: An intimate portrait of a resilient and spirited young girl and her proud and dignified family, who are part of Ireland's "traveller" community.
cast: Winnie Maughan|Rose Maughan|Rosie Maughan|Paddy Maughan|Michael Collins|Helen Joyce|Abbie Spallen|Brian Dignam|Angel|Joy Astin|Linda Balogun|Jacqui Caulfield|Hannah Cawley|Patrick Cawley|Thomas Cawley|Willie Cawley|Michael Chang|Nick Choy|Elaine Collins|Julie Collins|Michael James Collins|Sheila Collins|Tara Crooke|Balaram Das|Sai Rupa Das|Viswambhar Das|Moksa Rupa Dasi|Satya Dd|John Dooley|Simon Duffy|Rachel Freeman|Peter Ho|Joss Ivaneiue|Sharon Jones|Annie Joyce|Bernard Joyce|Catherine Joyce|Chris Joyce|Diana Joyce|Elaine Joyce|Joe Joyce|John Joyce|Margaret Joyce|Marie Joyce|Melissa Joyce|Michael Joyce|Patrick Joyce|Philomena Joyce|Sheila Joyce|Teresa Joyce|Emer Keeling|Alan Lien|Ken Lien|Yap Wai Ling|Bridget Maughan|Donna Maughan|James Maughan|Kathleen Maughan|Lisa Maughan|Margaret Maughan|Martin Maughan|Mary Maughan|Mary Kate Maughan|Nell Maughan|Ria Maughan|Joseph McDonell|Ciaran McMahon|Nick Vincent Murphy|Bonnie O'Brian|Gerry O'Brien|Creona O'Connor|James O'Reilly|Uyi Oghobaghose|Willie Price|Deeke Rivers|Oonagh Ryan|Ericka Saltenete|Hui Sang|Madhava Smullen|Bronwyn Thompson|Lisa Tighe|Michael Ward|Eilish Whelan|Gerry Zhao|Cathal Sheahan
title: Pavee Lackeen: The Traveller Girl
